definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Apiculture is a potential industry in the future.
sentences.chinese: 在以後，養蜂業是一個有潛力的行業。

sentences.english: Varroa mite is one of the most harmful vermin that disserve the beekeeping in the worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 大蜂蟎是危害世界養蜂業最爲嚴重的害蟲之一。
